Ogden.Episcopal Church of the Good Shepherd (O:
Episcopal Church of the Good Shepherd is a historic church at 2374 Grant Avenue in Ogden, Utah.
It was built in 1875 and added to the National Register of Historic Places in 1973.
Building History Good Shepherd Episcopal Church historic sanctuary was built in 1875 and is said to be the oldest building in continuous use in Ogden, Utah.
